name: DeathTrip
description:
You should have never gone on this trip...

after an accident, You found yourself in a strange house with someone not so friendly in it, now you have to find the exit and get out.

Note: it's required for you to play with headphones, otherwise you're gonna have trouble progressing.

Controls:

WASD Move.

LMB Pick up items.

RMB Drop Items.

Shift to Run

Ctrl to Crouch.

E to Interact

F  Turn off the flashlight.

if you noticed any bugs or glitches or you have any suggetstions  pls let me know in the comments down below or send me an email: Reza.mahdi1394@gmail.com

Various different SFX were used from www.freesound.org

Various different Assets were used from www.cgtrader.com

Various different assets were used from epic games content.

Various different textures were used from https://quixel.com/megascans/
